1-1.name: You
1-1.text: Where... Am I???

1-1.name: You
1-1.text: I should've... No, it can't be.

1-1.name: Shadowy figure
1-1.text: It is exactly what you think, you died...

1-1.name: Shadowy figure
1-1.text: Not yesterday, not the day before, not even the year before that...

1-1.name: Shadowy figure
1-1.text: It really has been a long time...

1-1.name: Shadowy figure
1-1.text: That is, because you are... At least, to a certain extent.

1-1.name: Shadowy figure
1-1.text: It is normal to feel disbelief...

1-1.name: Shadowy figure
1-1.text: You made the wrong choice in a moment of desperation. *Sigh*, it's a shame

1-1.name: Shadowy figure
1-1.text: Say, how much do you remember exactly?

1-1.name: Shadowy figure
1-1.text: Can't you even remember your very own name?

1-1.name: Shadowy figure
1-1.text: Can you recall your name?

1-1.name: Shadowy figure
1-1.text: What was your name then?

1-1.name: Shadowy figure
1-1.text: So you do remember your name after all.

1-1.name: Shadowy figure
1-1.text: I will grant you a second chance. A chance to avenge your past, your mistakes. Your regrets.

1-1.name: Shadowy figure
1-1.text: However, it will not come for granted. You must do something for me...

1-1.name: Shadowy figure
1-1.text: Defeat me.

1-1.name: Shadowy figure
1-1.text: In order to do that, you must first come to understand who you are.

1-1.name: Shadowy figure
1-1.text: After that, learn my identity. Only then you can defeat me.

1-1.name: You
1-1.text: How can I learn these things?

1-1.name: Shadowy figure
1-1.text: You are not the only person trapped in this blizzard... People, long forgotten. Heroes of the past, they still roam here. Searching for validation, just like you.

1-1.name: Shadowy figure
1-1.text: Meet them, they will help you recall you identity.

1-1.name: Shadowy figure
1-1.text: Find them, find yourself.

1-1.name: Shadowy figure
1-1.text: I will be waiting...
